title: The Gambler
description: Lady Anne Erskine meets Bill Benson, a gambler, and falls for him instantly. To her family’s horror, things soon spin out of control.
quote: May I remind you it’s my future to throw away.
altHero: Guy Dexter as Bill and Myrna Dalgliesh as Lady Anne, at a gambling table
alt1: Bill speaks with Lady Anne near some stairs
alt2: Bill looks at Lady Anne as she looks away, upset
alt3: Bill and Lady Anne stand and speak across a long dinner table full of people
alt4: Bill and Lady Anne hold hands and speak closely
